title: Rada; A Belgian Christmas Eve
description: This is not heart warming holiday fare. It is a short (one-act) unsubtle antiwar play by the English poet Alfred Noyes (1880-1958), published in 1915 while World War I is in progress. Part of the work is in verse. Music sung by Duane Steadman. (Summary by David Wales)

sections.title: 1 Part 1: Dedication, Prelude, and Cast of Characters
